title: Typhoon Surigae is slowly moving away from the eastern provinces of the Philippines
description: The first super typhoon of the season in the West Pacific made a close approach to the Eastern Philippines this weekend.

title: Manhunt underway for shooting suspect in Austin after three people were killed
description: Three people were pronounced dead at the scene of an active shooting incident in Austin, Texas, on Sunday, according to tweets from Austin-Travis County EMS.

title: Eligibility for vaccines is wide open but demand in US is dropping. Here's why
description: When health officials in Ohio's Mercer County opened their first Covid-19 vaccine drive-thru clinic in January, available slots filled up instantly, and more than 500 people were vaccinated in a single day.

title: Scary video shows toddler's encounter with Peloton treadmill
description: The US Consumer Product Safety Commission is warning people who use the Peloton Tread+ treadmill, saying there have been "multiple reports of children becoming entrapped, pinned, and pulled under" the device.

title: WWII era plane makes emergency landing near Florida beach
description: A World War II-era plane was forced to land off the coast of Cocoa Beach, Florida, Saturday afternoon after it experienced engine failure.

title: At least 11 killed, 98 injured in Egypt as train derails
description: At least 97 people were injured when a train went off the tracks near the city of Toukh, north of Cairo on Sunday, according to Egypt's Ministry of Health.

title: Fareed: Withdrawing from Afghanistan is the right move
description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria gives his take on President Joe Biden's decision to withdraw American troops from Afghanistan by September 11, 2021.

title: Ex-Australian PM: Murdoch didn't think Trump was qualified to be president
description: Former Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull speaks to CNN's Brian Stelter about Rupert Murdoch, the Australian-born American media mogul whose global empire includes Fox News.

title: Bush calls on Congress to tone down immigration rhetoric
description:
• Boehner: 'Republicans have to go back to being Republicans'
• Opinion: It's not enough to cancel Marjorie Taylor Greene's 'America First'

title: How should the media cover mass shootings?
description: CNN's Brian Stelter says the news media needs to consider a more holistic approach to covering shootings and gun violence instead of focusing on mass shootings as just breaking news.

title: Indianapolis FedEx shooter bought two weapons used in killings legally last year despite FBI concerns
World's next skateboard star is a 6-year-old girl riding ramps double her size
description: While her kindergarten classmates spend their free time playing with blocks and running around outside, Paige Tobin has been busy dropping into 12-foot high skateboard ramps, amassing a burgeoning online fanbase, and challenging gender stereotypes.

title: For the first time in six seasons, there will be a new Women's Champions League winner
Fauci on gun violence: 'How can you say that's not a public health issue?'
description: Dr. Anthony Fauci, President Joe Biden's chief medical adviser, acknowledged Sunday that gun violence in the US is a public health emergency.

title: Navalny's life is Putin's 'personal' responsibility, say Russian politicians
Russian suspects in Salisbury poisoning linked to blast in Czech Republic
description: The suspects of the 2018 novichok nerve agent poisoning of Sergei and Yulia Skripal in Salisbury, England, have been linked to a 2014 blast in the Czech Republic that killed two people.

title: In pictures: Prince Philip is laid to rest
description: Prince Philip, the late husband of Britain's Queen Elizabeth II, will be laid to rest Saturday in an intimate service at St. George's Chapel, which lies within the grounds of Windsor Castle.

title: Is this goodbye? Barcelona teammates line up for photos with Lionel Messi following Copa del Rey victory
description: The group of people had lined up and were waiting patiently to have their photos taken with Lionel Messi -- but these weren't fans, they were the Argentine's Barcelona teammates.

title: These siblings fled war-torn Syria. Now, the country they settled into is telling them to go back
description: It felt like paradise when Dania and Hussam first moved to Denmark.

title: Sikh community in mourning as 4 members were victims of the Indianapolis mass shooting
description: • Gunman was 19-year-old ex-FedEx staff

title: The world's biggest vaccine producer is running out of Covid-19 vaccines
description: In India, the world's biggest vaccine producer, millions of people are waiting for Covid-19 vaccines amid a devastating second wave of infections.

title: America desperately needs a Truth and Racial Healing Commission
description: Racism remains this nation's Achilles' heel. If we do not face it and fix it, we will continue to suffer. The news in the past few weeks, from the police shooting of Daunte Wright to the debate about voter suppression, underscores once again that we have a long way to go to fulfill America's promise of justice and equal opportunity for every American. To get closer to fulfilling that aspiration, we first need a consensus about the history of racism in the US and the effect it still has today.

title: Protests continue for sixth night as Daunte Wright's loved ones mourn for his son
description: As Daunte Wright's loved ones reflect on his son who will grow up without a father, police and protesters calling for justice in his death engaged in a standoff for the sixth night in a row.

title: Alexey Navalny's press secretary says he's 'dying' as Russian prosecutors target his foundation
description: The Moscow Prosecutor's Office filed a lawsuit on Friday with Moscow City Court seeking to label jailed Kremlin critic Alexey Navalny's anti-corruption foundation known as FBK and his headquarters as "extremist" organizations.
